message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with the opportunity to acquire this valuable product. Given its unique features and potential, I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. I'm initially offering it at $2,000,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  It shows you recognize the value of this product. To make this work, I'm willing to come down to $1,850,000.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm not quite there yet.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence.  To be completely transparent, I have another interested buyer who's prepared to offer $1,500,000. However, I believe in giving you the first opportunity.  I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000, but I need a decision soon.
I appreciate your transparency about the other buyer, but I'm not willing to pay $1,775,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1,775,000 and $1,700,000.
